statements: DELETE FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_id = 100 AND salesperson_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales region = 'East' AND sales_volume > 10000;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE calls_made < 10 AND date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM sales_history WHERE sale_amount > 1000 OR sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SalesMetrics WHERE actual < target;
DELETE FROM sales_performance WHERE team_id = 2 AND performance_value < 500.00;
